content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0)
Consists of steam engine (position 0), boiler (position 1), and offshore pump (position 2).

### Copper plate mine at position(3)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 3) and a furnace (position 4).

### Copper cable factory at position(5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position 5) and inserter (position 6) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position 7) that connects the furnace at position 4 to the assembling machine at position 5.

### Furnace at position(8)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 8).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items without required ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing it.

### Errors when trying to craft items without the necessary machines
- Verify that you are using the appropriate crafting machine or furnace for the items you are trying to craft.
